title: Brooch, "Venus", 1990
medium: Costume jewelry fragments, plastic, moulded and cut glass, lead, tin, brass, cast gilt metal
provenance: Helen W. Drutt English; 1991: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Helen W. Drutt English
description: Mask-like form composed of various media: plastic globes that look like fruit, colorful beads for feather-like affect, central metal fleur-de-lys, plastic white pineapples, glass leaves, topped with small red figure of Venus.

tombstone.epitaph: Brooch, "Venus", 1990. Costume jewelry fragments, plastic, moulded and cut glass, lead, tin, brass, cast gilt metal. Gift of Helen W. Drutt English. 1991-129-2.
